Results are from three different thingies

`r sprintf("![Miami Plot of SlopeHunter Adjusted GWAS at p = 0.0001](%s)", params$miami_plot)`

```{r echo=F}
collider_bias_results <- vroom::vroom(params$test, show_col_types = F) %>%
        subset(select = c(exposure, outcome, method, nsnp, b, se, pval, p.adjusted)) %>%
        arrange(exposure)
knitr::kable(collider_bias_results)
```

```
module add apps/singularity/3.8.3
singularity run -B /user/work/$(whoami) -B /user/home/$(whoami) --pwd /home/r_scripts/ \
  docker://andrewrrelmore/genepi_pipeline:get_other_docker_tag() \
    adjust_gwas_for_collider_bias.r --gwas params$test \
    --beta <BETA> \
    --se <SE> \
    --output_gwas <OUTPUT_FILE_NAME>
```
### Additional info

* This pipeline was run using the github repository: https://github.com/andrew-e/genepi-pipeline
* and the docker image: docker://andrewrrelmore/genepi_pipeline:`r get_other_docker_tag()`
